20101209020732.250|20101209020733.500|CCO|AND HERE NOW IS NEWSHOUR
20101209020733.500|20101209020734.750|CCO|POLITICAL EDITOR DAVID CHALIAN.
20101209020734.750|20101209020736.000|CCO|DAVID, SO WHERE DO THINGS STAND
20101209020736.000|20101209020737.250|CCO|RIGHT NOW?
20101209020737.250|20101209020738.500|CCO|>> WELL, I THINK YOU DO HAVE TO
20101209020738.500|20101209020739.750|CCO|LOOK AT BOTH CHAMBERS

20101209022105.000|20101209022107.000|CCO|EXCLUSIVE AND AN EXHAUSTIVE

20101209025031.000|20101209025032.667|CCO|WHAT OF THAT STORY AND WHAT OF
20101209025032.667|20101209025034.333|CCO|THE ENORMOUS CHANGES ON BROADWAY
20101209025034.333|20101209025036.000|CCO|AND MUSICAL NEAT CENTER SONDHEIM
20101209025036.000|20101209025037.667|CCO|FEARS THE ECONOMICS OF BROADWAY
20101209025037.667|20101209025039.333|CCO|HAVE FORCED PRODUCERS TO GO FOR
20101209025039.333|20101209025041.000|CCO|THE BIG SPECTACLE AND AWAY FROM
20101209025041.000|20101209025042.667|CCO|SMALLER AND MORE CHALLENGING
20101209025042.667|20101209025044.333|CCO|WORKS LIKE HIS.
20101209025044.333|20101209025046.000|CCO|>> I CAN UNDERSTAND THAT SAFETY
20101209025046.000|20101209025047.667|CCO|PLAY ON THE PART OF PRODUCERS,
20101209025047.667|20101209025049.333|CCO|BUT IT'S TERRIBLE BECAUSE YOUNG
20101209025049.333|20101209025051.000|CCO|WRITERS AREN'T GOING A CHANCE.
20101209025051.000|20101209025052.429|CCO|THE MAJOR THING IS YOU CANNOT
20101209025052.429|20101209025053.857|CCO|WRITE SHOWS JUST ON PAPER.
20101209025053.857|20101209025055.286|CCO|YOU LEARN TO WRITE BY WRITING IN
20101209025055.286|20101209025056.714|CCO|FRONT OF AN AUDIENCE.
20101209025056.714|20101209025058.143|CCO|THAT'S THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN
20101209025058.143|20101209025059.571|CCO|WRITING FOR THE THEATER AND
20101209025059.571|20101209025101.000|CCO|WRITING BOOKS OR PAINTING
20101209025101.000|20101209025102.667|CCO|PAINTINGSMENT YOU LEARN BY DOING
20101209025102.667|20101209025104.333|CCO|AND YOU CAN ONLY DO IT THAT WAY.
20101209025104.333|20101209025106.000|CCO|NOBODY WRITES A SENSATIONAL SHOW

20101209025107.667|20101209025109.333|CCO|THEY JUST DON'T BECAUSE THEY
20101209025109.333|20101209025111.000|CCO|HAVE TO LEARN THE CRAFT, AND THE
20101209025111.000|20101209025112.250|CCO|CRAFT IS NOT JUST THE CRAFT OF
20101209025112.250|20101209025113.500|CCO|WRITING.
20101209025113.500|20101209025114.750|CCO|IT'S THE CRAFT OF DOING.
20101209025114.750|20101209025116.000|CCO|IT'S THE CRAFT OF PUTTING IT ON.
20101209025116.000|20101209025117.250|CCO|IT'S THE CRAFT OF THE
20101209025117.250|20101209025118.500|CCO|COMBINATION OF THE ORCHESTRA AND
20101209025118.500|20101209025119.750|CCO|THE SIRNTION AND THE FINAL
20101209025119.750|20101209025121.000|CCO|COLLABORATOR, THE AUDIENCE,

20101209025122.429|20101209025123.857|CCO|FINALOLLABORATOR ON EVERY
20101209025123.857|20101209025125.286|CCO|SHOW.
20101209025125.286|20101209025126.714|CCO|UNTIL YOU WORK WITH THAT
20101209025126.714|20101209025128.143|CCO|COLLABORATOR, YOU HAVEN'T
